amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section at the end of the bill which would predicate the enactment of the bill upon Presidential certification that the provisions of the bill would not have an adverse effect on the health of at risk subpopulations of Americans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end of the bill entitled Delayed Effective Date.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 256 (Roll no. 758).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 256 (Roll no. 758).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Moore.
